user.title: Order Placed
user.body:
Your order with the store store_name is successfully placed. 
Once store representative accept the order, you will be notified.

store.title: Order Placed
store.body: A customer user_name has placed an order orderId with your store. Please check and accept the order based on availability of products or services.

user.title: Order Accepted
user.body: Your order orderId is accepted and also changed based on the products and services available at store store_name.

user.title: Order Accepted
user.body: Your order orderId is accepted by store_name

user.title: Order Rejected
user.body: Your order orderId is rejected by store_name

user.title: Make A Payment
user.body: Please make a payment for the accepted order {{orderId}} to proceed further.

store.title: Order Cancelled
store.body: Your store order orderId is cancelled by user_name

store.title: Order Successfully Paid
store.body: Your order orderId is successfully paid

user.title: Order Completed Successfully
user.body: Your order orderId is now complete

user.title: Pickup ready
user.body: Your order orderId is ready for pickup at store_name

user.title: Waiting for pickup!
user.body: Your order {{orderId}} is ready and waiting for you to pick up at store {{storeName}}

user.title: Delivery ready
user.body: Your order orderId is ready for delivery by store_name

delivery-user.title: Order Is Ready For Delivery
delivery-user.body: Order with order Id orderId is ready for delivery from store store_name. Please accept the order if you are ok to deliver

user.title: Reward Points Earned
user.body: You have earned rewardPointsEarnedPerOrder reward points for your order orderId with store_name

user.title: Reward Points cancelled
user.body: The reward points were cancelled as the order orderId is no longer valid with store store_name

user.title: Items waiting in your cart
user.body: You have unordered items in the cart. Please make an order not to miss the current offers.

user.title: Hurry up! Grab the offer
user.body: Donâ€™t miss this offer! Get INR150 off on your first order with us. Use code {{discountCode}}.

store.title: New Bargain Request
store.body: A new bargain request has been made by customer user_name. You can Accept or Counter or Edit the bargain request based on the availability.

store.title: Counter Offer By Customer
store.body: Customer made a counter offer to the offer you made for the bargain request bargainRequestId

store.title: A New Message In Bargain
store.body: A new message has been added to the bargain request bargainRequestId by user_name

user.title: A New Message In Bargain
user.body: A new message has been added to the bargain request bargainRequestId by store_name

store.title: Bargain request cancelled
store.body: The bargain request bargainRequestId has been cancelled by the customer user_name

store.title: Bargain request completed
store.body: The bargain request bargainRequestId has been completed by the customer user_name

user.title: Store Counter to Bargain Request
user.body: Store store_name made a counter offer to the bargain request bargainRequestId you made. If you like the offer, you can place order.

user.title: Store Rejected Bargain request
user.body: Store store_name rejected the bargain request bargainRequestId you made. Please place another request.

user.title: Store Accepted Bargain request
user.body: Store store_name accepted the bargain request bargainRequestId you made. You can place order.

user.title: Bargain Request Quantity Updated
user.body: Store store_name updated the quantity of the bargain request bargainRequestId based on availability.

store.title: Grab Your Lead
store.body: There is an auction request reverseAuctionId from a customer, to grab the customer to your store, please place a bid with competitive offer

store.title: Auction cancelled
store.body: The reverse auction reverseAuctionId has been cancelled by user_name

store.title: Auction End date Changed
store.body: store_name has been changed reverseAuctionId the end date by user_name

user.title: Bid offer from Store for your request
user.body: There is a bid offer from store store_name for your bid request reverseAuctionId. Please check and accept if you like it.

store.title: one store accepted
store.body: There is a bid offer from store store_name for your bid request reverseAuctionId. Please check and accept if you like it.

store.title: other stores are rejected
store.body: There is a bid offer from store store_name for your bid request reverseAuctionId. Please check and accept if you like it.

user.title: A Scratch Card Is Issued
user.body: Thank you for your order. We issued a scratch card as you are a valued customer. Try your luck.

user.title: Referral Reward Points Earned
user.body: Thank you for referring your friend to TradeMantri. You have earned referredByUserAmount Rs in TradeMantri reward(referredByUserRewardPoints points) which you can use towards your orders

user.title: Referral Sign Up Reward Points Earned
user.body: Thank you for signing up with TradeMantri. You have earned referralUserAmount Rs in TradeMantri reward(referralUserRewardPoints points) which you can use towards your orders

user.title: Referral Reward Points Earned
user.body: Thank you for referring a business to TradeMantri. You have earned referredByUserAmount Rs in TradeMantri reward(referredByUserRewardPoints points) which you can use towards your orders

store.title: Referral Sign Up Reward Points Earned
store.body: Thank you for registering your business with TradeMantri. You have earned referralUserAmount Rs in TradeMantri rewards (referralUserRewardPoints point) which you can use towards your subscription or orders you make to the vendors.

store.title: New Applicant For Your Job
store.body: There is a new applicant named applicant_name applied for your job posting. Please check
